Uses of Class
poised.Project

  • Uses of Project in poised

    Subclasses of Project in poised
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    EditAndFinaliseProject
    Subclass that edits and sets new information attributed to a Project object from the projectList selected by the user.
    Methods in poised that return Project
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Project
    SearchAndViewProjects.searchProj(List<Project> projectList)
    Method searches for a specified project in the project list Input is requested until the user inputs a valid searchNameOrNumber that matches either the project name or project number, then return the project information along with its Customer, Contractor and Architect attributes.
    Methods in poised that return types with arguments of type Project
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<Project>
    ReadAndWriteToFile.readProjectsFromFile(File projectsFile)
    Method reads each line form the text file and splits up the comma seperated values into associated Project fields.
    Methods in poised with parameters of type Project
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Project.captureProject(Project newPoiseProject)
    Captures, validates and sets information to create a new Project object.
    void
    Project.createProjectName(Project newPoiseProject, Person projectCustomer)
    Creates and sets a project name projName if the object feild is empty or equals to the "none" value initialised in the objects attributes.
    static void
    EditAndFinaliseProject.editProjDeadline(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
    Captures, validates and sets the projDeadline of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.
    static void
    EditAndFinaliseProject.editProjFeePaid(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
    Captures, validates and sets the projFeePaid of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.
    static void
    EditAndFinaliseProject.editProjFeeTotal(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
    Captures, validates and sets the projFeeTotal of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.
    static void
    EditAndFinaliseProject.generateInvoice(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
    Generates an invoice of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.
    static void
    EditAndFinaliseProject.markProjFinalisation(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
    Captures, validates and sets the projCompletionDate and the projFinalised status to true of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.
    static void
    ReadAndWriteToFile.writeCompletedProjectToFile(File completedProjectsFile, Project completedProject)
    Calls the toString method of the specified completed project to obtain the string details then writes and appends the object details to CompletedProjects.txt.
    static void
    ReadAndWriteToFile.writeProjectToFile(File projectsFile, Project newProject)
    Calls the projectString method to obtain the string details of a single newly captured project then writes and appends the object details to PoiseProjects.txt.

    static Project
    SearchAndViewProjects.searchProj(List<Project> projectList)
    Method searches for a specified project in the project list Input is requested until the user inputs a valid searchNameOrNumber that matches either the project name or project number, then return the project information along with its Customer, Contractor and Architect attributes.
    static void
    SearchAndViewProjects.viewAllProj(List<Project> projectList)
    Method displays each project object in the project list.
    static void
    SearchAndViewProjects.viewIncompleteProj(List<Project> projectList)
    Method displays all project objects in the project list that are incomplete.
    static void
    SearchAndViewProjects.viewOverdueProj(List<Project> projectList)
    Method displays all project objects in the project list that are past the set deadline.
    static void
    ReadAndWriteToFile.writeListToFile(File projectsFile, List<Project> projectList)
    Calls the projectString method to obtain the string details of all the projects in the projectList then writes each object to PoiseProjects.txt.
